org.epics.pvmanager.jca

Class JCAConnectionPayload

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.epics.pvmanager.jca.JCAConnectionPayload

  • public class JCAConnectionPayload
extends Object
    Represents the connection payload, which consists of the actual JCA Channel and the JCADataSource (which can be used to extract configuration parameters).
    Author:
    carcassi
